name: .NX
summary: Learn about .NX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use an NX file with the PC versions of LowRes NX, open LowRes NX and then drag and drop your NX file into the program. To use an NX file with the iOS version of LowRes NX, long-press the file, select Share, and then open the file with LowRes NX.
You can also open and edit an NX file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text or source code editor.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .nx file in LowRes NX
images.caption: NX file open in LowRes NX

images.alt: NX file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: NX file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
